description: Lists all Windows Scheduled Tasks with key properties (state, author, run level, triggers, actions) and emits NDJSON lines, plus up to 5 recent completion events per task from the Task Scheduler Operational log (last 7 days). Uses atomic overwrite of the Active Response log with .new fallback.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
